name: StuntDouble
summary: Step into the thrilling world of Hollywood's elite stunt doubles in Stunt Double Joe McFlash. As a renowned stunt driver, you're invited to a lively TV chat show to discuss your daring career. Relive the adrenaline-pumping moments from five blockbuster films where you performed heart-stopping stunts. Navigate high-speed chases, execute death-defying jumps, and manoeuvr through explosive set pieces, all from the immersive first-person perspective that only VR can provide.  More films coming soon
